actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch Act to provide that income used for certain special hardship conditions shall not be included as income for purposes of determining eligibility for free or reduced-price lunches.

summary.text: Amends the National School Lunch Act to provide that income used for specified hardship conditions shall not be included as income for purposes of determining free or reduced-price lunch eligibility.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National School Lunch Act to provide that income used for certain special hardship conditions shall not be included as income for purposes of determining eligibility for free or reduced-price lunches.
